definition: must/to need to/to be sure to
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你們務必不要讓孩子接觸危險物品。

sentences.english: We must now ask you to settle this account within the next few days.
sentences.chinese: 請你務必在這幾日內結清這筆賬款。

sentences.english: Be sure to hand in your compositions this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 務必在今天下午把作文交來。

sentences.english: Be sure to place them correctly .
sentences.chinese: 務必把這些東西放對地方。

sentences.english: But let's make sure we do it graciously and prayerfully.
sentences.chinese: 但我們務必要以慈愛和禱告的心來作這工。

sentences.english: As this article is fragile, be sure to put enough padding.
sentences.chinese: 此物易碎，請務必裝入足夠之填充物。

sentences.english: Make sure this order is brought to the attention of all IDF soldiers".
sentences.chinese: 此令務必傳達全體以色列國防軍士兵。

sentences.english: You are to use ink, make no erasures.
sentences.chinese: 務必使用鋼筆，而且不能塗改。

sentences.english: The wind is blowing hard; please see to that all the windows are fastened properly.
sentences.chinese: 颳大風了，請務必把所有的窗子都關好。

sentences.english: Be sure to footnote both argument and evidentiary citations.
sentences.chinese: 務必要記得，在引用不同論點和證據時，要加上。

sentences.english: "Two Advices" is the essence of Xibaipo Spirit.
sentences.chinese: “兩個務必”是西柏坡精神的核心。
寫作清晰，務必精簡，避免贅言。

sentences.english: If you want to join the second payment, you have to send me ae-mail based on the next indication.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要參加第二次付款，請務必發發郵件給我。

sentences.english: If you have unemployment insurance, be sure to pay the whole.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有失業保險的，務必要交全。

sentences.english: Because it is our confidence in the design of ultra-be sure to try it.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是我們超自信的設計請務必嘗試一下。

sentences.english: Be sure to plant this rose in your sunniest spot.
sentences.chinese: 請務必在您的工廠這個陽光最充足的地方上升。

definition: to call on (sb to do sth)/to appeal (to)/an appeal
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
at any time/at all times/at the right time
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
